name: Kei26 - Union Game Engine
description:
Kei26 is an experimental game about an aspiring game dev.

Explore their broken, abandoned projects, and learn more about who they are.

How to play
  • Click on a project thumbnail to play it
  • Arrow keys to move and jump
  • Stomp on enemies
  • Collect coins
Intentions

This is more of a walking simulator than a traditional platformer, so you'll probably find it really easy. My main goal was to try and tell a story through unconventional methods. Your reactions will tell me how well that went. :d

Made for Ludum Dare 49 with the theme of "Unstable"

Things I didn't make
  • All the music
  • The explosion animations
  • Most of the sound effects

I got those from Freesound and OpenGameArt, public domain.

As you can tell I made all the beautiful graphics.
